original_text: That which hath been is now; and that which is to be hath already been; and God requireth that which is past.
korean_text: 이제 있는 것이 옛적에 있었고 장래에 있을 것도 옛적에 있었나니 하나님은 이미 지난 것을 다시 찾으시느니라

sentences.original_text: That which hath been is now
and that which is to be hath already been
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 장차 있을 것은 이미 있었다

sentences.original_text: and God requireth that which is past
